verses.roman:
tabe śivānandera mane pratīti ha-ila
aneka sammāna kari' bahu bhakti kaila

synonyms: tabe—thereupon; śivānandera—of Śivānanda Sena; mane—in the mind; pratīti ha-ila—there was confidence; aneka sammāna kari'-offering him much respect; bahu bhakti kaila—offered him devotional service.
translation: Śivānanda Sena thereupon developed full confidence in his mind that Nakula Brahmacārī was filled with the presence of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu. Śivānanda Sena then offered him respect and devotional service.
